column5: thought i would share this pic that was sent to me. Real or not can you just imagine
Yeah - they're real alright, Google for River Ebro Catfish to see more of the same. Apparently it's like tying your line to the back of someone's car!
Come on down to Virginia we use them things for bait.   Art
Hahaha..how do you hook them, through the tail, or lip?  I always wondered about that.
Thru the lip that way you can get your bait back... While the bait is only $100.00 each the cost of the livewell I built for them was the big expense.     Art
